helper

Class PersistentConfigurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.PersistentConfigurationHelper

  • public class PersistentConfigurationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to persist component configurations using ConfigValue as data elements in the database.

    TODO: This is a monster (well, a bit less than ConfigValue). Comment better, rework and/or change to JSON.

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

    • Constructor Detail

      • PersistentConfigurationHelper

        public PersistentConfigurationHelper()
        Instantiates a new persistent configuration helper without database backend. Works as a non-persistent in-memory configruation. Useful for testing.

      • PersistentConfigurationHelper

        public PersistentConfigurationHelper(ComponentConfigurationController componentConfigurationController,
                                     java.lang.String configDomain,
                                     java.lang.String[] path)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                     DatabaseException
        Instantiates a new persistent configuration helper.
        Parameters:
        componentConfigurationController - the component configruation controller
        configDomain - the database domain to use for storing configuration (should not contain anything else)
        path - the path of the config element
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an illegal argument is given.
        DatabaseException - if a database error occurs.
